short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple way to copy Bearer tokens (and other Authorization header values).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple way to copy Bearer tokens (and other Authorization header values). The extensions adds a new panel to the Developer tools, that shows all requests with the 'Authorization' header and the header value. Also a 'Copy' button for easy copying.
